relatedBlades.title: Internet trends report: Deep dive into the latest cyber threats
relatedBlades.copy: The latest refinements to cyber attacks has threat actors focusing on high-value targets, evading common DDoS defenses, and upgrading botnet infrastructure to enable larger attacks.

imageAssetFile.title: Internet trends report: Deep dive into the latest cyber threats - Image

features.title: DDoS is on the rise
features.description: With cyber attacks becoming easier and cheaper to execute, DDoS attacks have become more prevalent. We've already seen attacks peaking above 71 million requests per second, the largest recorded this year

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - DDoS is on the rise - Image

features.title: The ripple effect of compromised credentials
features.description: 44% of employees use the same credentials for personal and work accounts — once exposed, the vulnerability is shared with their organization

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Threat Landscape - The ripple effect of compromised credentials - Image

features.title: Risk grows as multi-vector becomes norm
features.description: Attackers targeting two (or more) vectors at a time - have dramatically improved their chances of successful entry

imageAssetFile.title: Risk grows as multi-vector becomes norm - image
